verses.verse: Now when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7668>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H7200>look<s%> one on another?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that there is <S%H7668>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3381>get<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> for us from <S%H8033>there;<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> not with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> peradventure <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H7122>befall<s%> him.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> corn <S%H8432>among<s%> those that <S%H935>came:<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was the <S%H7989>governor<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and he it was that <S%H7666>sold<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> themselves before him with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and he <S%H5234>knew<s%> them, but made himself <S%H5234>strange<s%> to them, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> to them; and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, From <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> you? And they <S%H559>said,<s%> From the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5234>knew<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> but they <S%H5234>knew<s%> not him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> of them, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, You are <S%H7270>spies;<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> you are <S%H935>come.<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> but to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> are your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>
We are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> we are <S%H3651>true<s%> men, your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7270>spies.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3808>No,<s%> but to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> you are <S%H935>come.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> is not.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, That is it that I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You are <S%H7270>spies:<s%>

<S%H2063>Hereby<s%> you shall be <S%H974>proved:<s%> By the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2088>hence,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> here.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of you, and let him <S%H3947>fetch<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and you shall be <S%H631>kept<s%> in prison, that your <S%H1697>words<s%> may be <S%H974>proved,<s%> whether there be any <S%H571>truth<s%> in you: or <S%H518>else<s%> <S%H3808><s%> by the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> surely you are <S%H7270>spies.<s%>
And he <S%H622>put<s%> them <S%H622>all<s%> together <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H4929>ward<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%> for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you be <S%H3651>true<s%> men, let <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> be <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H4929>prison:<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> you, <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H7668>corn<s%> for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>houses:<s%>

But <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to me; so shall your <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H539>verified,<s%> and you shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%> And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> We are <S%H61>truly<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> our <S%H251>brother,<s%> in that we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6869>anguish<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> when he <S%H2603>sought<s%> us, and we would not <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6869>distress<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on us.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H559>Spoke<s%> I not to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Do not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3206>child;<s%> and you would not <S%H8085>hear?<s%> <S%H1571>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> is <S%H1875>required.<s%>
And they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8085>understood<s%> them; for he spoke to them by an <S%H3887>interpreter.<s%>

And he <S%H5437>turned<s%> himself about from them, and <S%H1058>wept;<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to them <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> from them <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks<s%> with <S%H1250>corn,<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H8242>sack,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H6720>provision<s%> for the <S%H1870>way:<s%> and <S%H3651>thus<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he to them.
And they <S%H5375>laded<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> with the <S%H7668>corn,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And as <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H8242>sack<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%> in the <S%H4411>inn,<s%> he <S%H7200>espied<s%> his <S%H3701>money;<s%> for, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was in his <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> My <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H7725>restored;<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> it is even in my <S%H572>sack:<s%> and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> them, and they were <S%H2729>afraid,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to us?

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7136>befell<s%> to them; <S%H559>saying,<s%>
The <S%H376>man,<s%> who is the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7186>roughly<s%> to us, and <S%H5414>took<s%> us for <S%H7270>spies<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>
And we <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We are <S%H3651>true<s%> men; we are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7270>spies:<s%>

We be <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of our <S%H1>father;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> is not, and the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> is this <S%H3117>day<s%> with our <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H113>lord<s%> of the <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to us, <S%H2063>Hereby<s%> shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H3651>true<s%> men; <S%H5117>leave<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> here with me, and <S%H3947>take<s%> food for the <S%H7459>famine<s%> of your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and be <S%H3212>gone:<s%>

And <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to me: then shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7270>spies,<s%> but that you are <S%H3651>true<s%> men: so will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and you shall <S%H5503>traffic<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass as they <S%H7324>emptied<s%> their <S%H8242>sacks,<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> was in his <S%H8242>sack:<s%> and when both they and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6872>bundles<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> they were <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Me have you <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my children: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is not, and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> is not, and you will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> away: <S%H3605>all<s%> these things are <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4191>Slay<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> if I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not to you: <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him <S%H5921>into<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> him to you <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not <S%H3381>go<s%> down with you; for his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and he is <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H905>alone:<s%> if <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H7122>befall<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3212>go,<s%> then shall you <S%H3381>bring<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> my <S%H7872>gray<s%> hairs with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>
